text: A Doll's House is a 1959 live telecast based on Henrik Ibsen's 1879 play A Doll's House directed by George Schaefer. It was broadcast on 15 November 1959. ==Cast== * Julie Harris — Nora Helmer * Christopher Plummer — Torvald Helmer * Hume Cronyn — Nils Krogstad * Eileen Heckart — Kristine Linde * Jason Robards — Dr. Rank ==References== Category:1959 movies Category:American television movies Category:Movies based on plays Category:Movies directed by George Schaefer
title: A Doll's House (1959 movie)
